fields.description:
Create a listSection with a view header having opacity less than 1.
When empty the listSection from items, the viewed opacity of the header changes to 1,
though the value of the opacity in the viewHeader is correct as created.
Sample code attached.

PS. this may affect sibilig section headers as well!

attachment.filename: iOS Simulator Screen Shot May 5, 2015, 3.14.43 PM.png
iOS Simulator Screen Shot May 5, 2015, 3.14.51 PM.png

fields.summary: iOS: Empty items from list view cause opacity loss of view in section header(s)

comments.body:
Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "*Opacity loss*" in section header(s) is working fine for me. Opacity of view in section header will remain same when list view is empty . I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126, ti SDK 4.1.0 GA and Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 4.1.2

I recommend you upgrade SDK to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.
Thanks
